mapper.sql: id, customer_code, customer_type, customer_name, contacts, address, tel, memo, salesman, credit_price, enabled, created_time, updated_time, created_id, updated_id

where.if: and (a.customer_code like '%${q}%' or a.customer_name like '%${q}%' or a.tel like '%${q}%' )

mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.customer_code, a.customer_name, a.contacts, a.address, a.tel, a.memo, a.salesman, a.credit_price, IFNULL(getEnableReserveByCustomerCode(a.customer_code), 0) as enable_reserve, a.enabled, b.customer_name as salesman_name FROM bus_customer a LEFT JOIN bus_customer b ON a.salesman = b.customer_code

select customer.customer_name as c_customer_name, customer.customer_code as c_customer_code, customer.customer_type as c_customer_type, (select customer1.customer_name from bus_customer customer1 where customer1.customer_code = customer.salesman ) as c_salesman, bus_vip_unpaid.unpaid_id as p_unpaid_id, bus_vip_unpaid.customer_code as p_customer_code, bus_vip_unpaid.shop_id as p_shop_id, bus_vip_unpaid.pay_mode as p_pay_mode, bus_vip_unpaid.trade_type as p_trade_type, bus_vip_unpaid.trade_status as p_trade_status, bus_vip_unpaid.trade_time as p_trade_time, bus_vip_unpaid.trade_price as p_trade_price, bus_vip_unpaid.gift_price as p_gift_price, bus_vip_unpaid.memo as p_memo, bus_vip_unpaid.order_id as p_order_id, bus_vip_unpaid.card_no as p_card_no, bus_vip_unpaid.unusual as p_unusual, bus_vip_unpaid.pay_id as p_pay_id, bus_vip_unpaid.relation_id as p_relation_id, bus_shop.shop_name as p_shop_name from bus_customer customer LEFT JOIN bus_vip_unpaid bus_vip_unpaid ON bus_vip_unpaid.customer_code = customer.customer_code and bus_vip_unpaid.trade_type in (6,7) LEFT JOIN bus_shop bus_shop on bus_shop.shop_id = bus_vip_unpaid.shop_id where customer.customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT sum(IFNULL(getEnableReserveByCustomerCode(a.customer_code), 0)) as enable_reserve, sum(a.credit_price) as credit_price FROM bus_customer a

select IFNULL(getEnableReserveByCustomerCode(customer_code), 0) as enable_reserve,
from bus_customer where customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
